trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the **RowUpdating** event of a .NET Framework data provider.
The `RowUpdating` event is typically raised just before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row begins.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute when <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref> is called.
The type of SQL statement to execute.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> object for an instance of this class.
This method allows implementations to perform type checking for the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object assignment.
Only valid <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objects, for example a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, should be permitted.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref> operation.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command"></xref> executes.
The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command"></xref> executes.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that will be sent to the server as part of an insert, update, or delete operation.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to send through an <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
Gets the type of SQL statement to execute.
<xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs.StatementType%2A> can be one of the following values:
Select
Insert
Update
Delete
The type of SQL statement to execute.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command"></xref> property.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
The default is `Continue`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)"></xref>.
